TheWord.Title: God, Help Me to love You, more.

Prophet.Commentary: Jehu the son of Hanani the seer went out to meet him, and said to king Jehoshaphat, Should You help the ungodly, and love them that hate the LORD? therefore is wrath upon you from before the LORD (2 Chronicles 19:2). Salute Urbane, our helper in Christ, and Stachys my beloved (Romans 16:9).

AlphabetSequence.Word: God, Help Me to love You, more.

CaseBasedReasoning.Commentary: Wake-up Orientation: Knees bowed, left hand inside knees. Mouth secreation: Left side of the mouth. Nose running: Left, right. File creation error - Data error (cyclic redundancy check) ... Left hand twitches.
